data: rosas são vermelhas, violetas são roxas, apenas feche logo essa porra
seu pai de calcinha train ouh train trey
about: (comon values)
name is pretty self explanatory, simply type in anything you want
icon is also self explanatory, simply type in your icon name, reminder that it needs to be inside the credits folder inside images
description can be anything, it will show up on the bottom bar
quote can be anything, it will show up after the description
link would be any website URL, such as your twitter profile or any other link
(background colors)
bgcolor(R), referencing *R*GB values
bgcolor(G), referencing R*G*B values
bgcolor(B), referencing RG*B* values
(icons)
offsetX is the vertical offset for an icon
offsetY is the horizontal offset for an icon
then there's the "size" for an icon (ex: 0.7)
(values)
name, icon, description, and link are String values, meaning you can type whatever you want on them
bgcolor(R), (G), and (B), are int values, you can configure them as normal RGB values, ex: [68, 68, 68]
offsetX and offsetY are int values, simply put, it's how far or close your icon is to the center, you can adjust the values to fit your needs
size is a float value which sets you icon size, float values support decimals, so if I wanted my icon to be rather small, I'd just do '0.7' on the value
if you have any more questions, make sure to contact me on Discord, i tried to make this json as documented as possible
BeastlyGhost♧#9035
